name: Rainbow Snake (itch) (Spielsieb)
description:
Created for Trijam #113 in 3 hours.

Control Snake with arrow keys to gather the colored food.

What it was going to be: Puzzle-Snake - Gather the rainbow pieces in the right order and without touching any obstacles to progress to the next level.

What it is: Slow Snake - it was time over before I could implement any of the levels - so it's just colorful snake - slow snake because Autorun is turned off - which seemed like a good idea for the puzzler. Not so much for Basic Snake :)
